SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: End date MIMED Data email address
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: End date MIMED Data email address
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_USR_UMHS_BATCH_ENDDATEEMAIL ( @ID uniqueidentifier ,@ENDDATE datetime ,@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null ) as begin
set nocount on;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
update dbo.USR_UMHS_EMAILADDRESS set ISPRIMARY=0 ,DONOTEMAIL = 1 ,ENDDATE=@ENDDATE ,CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID ,DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE where ID=@ID
end
